item.title: FT Most Read: Thursday, March 20, 2025 at 10:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. BYD’s 5-minute charge: is time running out for electric-vehicle rivals?
2. EU to exclude US, UK and Turkey from €150bn rearmament fund
3. US could take over Ukrainian nuclear power plants, Trump tells Zelenskyy
4. [Opinion] Europe is only half-awake from its long sleep
5. Fed cuts US growth forecast as Trump’s policies weigh on outlook
item.guid: FT Most Read: Thursday, March 20, 2025 at 10:15 AM UTC
